p: Furthermore, the altitudinal pattern of the highly suitable habitat under the current situation was analyzed. Thirty percent of the highly suitable habitat was below 500 m, 70% was below 1200 m, and almost 90% was below 1700 m. The highly suitable habitat above 1700 m consisted of slightly less than 10%. In the medium suitable region, the region below 200 m accounted for nearly 30%, the region below 600 m accounted for more than 50%, and 90% of this region was not higher than 2000 m ( Fig 5).
